How can I check the virus detection results for the Verus software on different operating systems?

You can check the virus detection results for the Verus software on different operating systems by visiting the provided links on VirusTotal, a website that analyzes files and URLs for viruses and malware. The links are provided for MacOS, Linux-x86-64, Linux-ARM64, and Windows.
